channel.title: Posts on Reasonable AI
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Reasonable AI

item.title: How to Build a Machine Learning Demo in 2022
item.description: Learn why you should build demos for your Machine Learning models in 2022, and how to do it in a way that fits your needs, skills, and audience.

item.title: Good practices for neural network training: identify, save, and document best models
item.description: An introduction to the good practice of best model saving when training a neural network, and a practical implementation using fastai and Weights & Biases
